title: Choosing Healthy Friends + Being a Healthy Friend
description:
We are built to live in community, but we are also supposed to use discernment and be intentional about who we do life with. In this episode, learn how being vulnerable with safe, healthy people can push us to become more like Christ. Also hear from Jim Cofield about why the quality of our relationships is so important and the characteristics to look for when choosing our people.

Download the friend guide PDF: jennieallen.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267

If you’ve already gone through the Find Your People book with your book club, check out the Find Your People Bible Study to go deeper with your people. Learn more at jennieallen.com/bible-studies
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
